title: After Life: Answers from the Other Side
description:
After Life: Answers from the Other Side By John Edward, Larry King
2010 | 256 Pages | ISBN: 1402775571 | EPUB | 1 MB



What happens after we die?

The acclaimed medium takes his talents to new levels and new countries! For After Life, John and a documentary crew traveled to Australia and across the United States, where he demonstrated once again that grief, healing, and hope are eternally intertwined. He answers his fans' most-asked questions about the mediumship process and how it works, while revealing his own personal life as a husband and new father. John also connects with celebrities both here and on the other side.
